Comment 14: 
proposal in #12 is fine with me. we might need to fine tune some details to
match the binary distributions, though.

I'd suggest we check tools.{bash,bat,rc} into the main tree (also consider
adding a special flag to make it prepare the source into $GOROOT/tools,
so that we can even test this without invoking misc/dist)
[in fact, cmd/dist could just call tools.bash to do the preparation work]
